subject: Hello Charles.
body:
Hello Charles,

Thanks for your swift response and my anticipation for a better cooperation.My name is Mr John Devis and i was the one that asked my associate  Mr. Borisovich to find a foreigner's contact information because the fund will be approved to foreigner's account details with legal claims to the fund.I must sincerely assure you that nothing illegal will happen in this business either now or later, I can not afford to involve myself in something that is not legal even if it involves Millions of pounds because I want the best for this transaction so I would want you to be rest-assured that everything have already worked out once you follow my instructions as i advice.

This is not a regular business that comes and goes, it is a fated opportunity and such opportunity usually come once in a life time.Your security is 100% guaranteed, be sure that everything will be successful, I want your full cooperation from your side and I will do the same from this side to ensure that all arrangements here are perfectly in order, so don't be worried or curious for any reason. I contacted you with faith hoping and believing in faith that you will not betray me once the fund is transferred to you in your country. You should understand that I am not doing this business because of the large amount that is involved on it but rather the success of this business will benefit both families from generation to generation as far as you follow the instruction which I will be getting from the insider in the company who is the main key to success of this transaction and you should know that never can a business to success without building trust with each other. I promise you that I will never let you down in this business either now or in the future and you must assure me that is as well.

In fact , I am very much interested to know whether you will be capable of doing this business with me in full confidence.I will apply for release of the fund on your behalf with your account details, this will enable the Bank to process the payment officially to your account and foreign exchange Approval will be issued in your name by the National Treasury Department Of Finance in your favor legalizing the transfer to your name as sole inheritor so that your Government or your Bank will not question about source\origin of the Fund as the National Treasury Department Of Finance has already Legalized and Authorize the Transfer under the back up cover of repatriation of earning,investing scheme.

You should also send to me, your account information where you want the fund to be transferred. If you can be fast,the Transfer will be concluded within14 banking days but you should keep the business to yourself as top secret because success of this transaction is highly confidential. You should not tell your bank that money is coming to your account for now because they can ask you early questions which you may not be able to answer. I will tell you what and when to tell your bank with all the necessary documents to back up the source and origin of the fund as a legitimate fund from a genuine source. Below is the data needed from you for processing of the payment in your name

Bank account details in full

1. Bank Name:..................

2. Account Name:...................

3. Account Number:..............

4. Bank Address:..............

5. Swift Code:...............

6. Iban Number..............

7. A copy of your international passport or driver's license

8. Your Profession.............

9. Your Cell phone number.................

10. Full Residential Address..........................

After processing the payment in your name the bank will start to pay the fund bit by bit to your account as regards to your instruction.

 Mr. John Devis.



Borisovich, thank you for reaching out to me with this proposal. It certainly came as a surprise, but I'm open to hearing more about it. Can you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly did you come across this deposit account? And what would be my role in helping to claim and transfer the funds?
Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hello Charles,

Thank you for your response and willingness to hear more about this opportunity. I understand that this proposal may come as a surprise, but I assure you that everything is legal and legitimate. Let me provide you with some additional details.

I came across this deposit account through my associate, Mr. Borisovich, who was tasked with finding potential partners for this business venture. The funds in question are substantial, and our goal is to have them transferred to your account with the necessary legal claims and approvals.

Your role in this process would be crucial. Once we have your account details, I will apply for the release of the funds on your behalf. This will enable the bank to process the payment officially to your account, and a foreign exchange approval will be issued in your name by the National Treasury Department of Finance.

It's important to keep this business venture confidential for now, as its success relies on maintaining secrecy. Please refrain from informing your bank about the incoming funds at this stage, as they may ask questions that could complicate matters. I will guide you on when and how to inform them later on, providing all necessary documents to support the legitimacy of the funds.

To proceed further, I kindly request that you provide me with the following information:

1. Bank account details in full (Bank Name, Account Name, Account Number)
2. Bank Address
3. Swift Code
4. IBAN
5. A copy of your passport or driver's license
6. Your cell phone number

Once we have these details and complete the necessary processing, the bank will start transferring the funds bit by bit into your account according to an agreed-upon schedule.

I hope this clarifies things a bit more for you, Charles. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.

Best regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

You sent back the message initially was sent to you but no details about the requested information  from you. Kindly explain to me.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for reaching out. I apologize if my previous message was not clear. Could you please provide me with more information about the request you mentioned? I want to make sure I understand what you're looking for so that I can assist you properly.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles

Thank you for your response. Below is the data needed from you for processing of the payment in your name

Bank account details in full

5. Swift Code:...............

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. However, before I provide any personal details, could you please clarify the purpose of this payment and why my bank account information is needed? Additionally, can you explain how this information will be used and kept secure?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

Thank you for your response. I told you for clarity's sake, your presence would be required because this is transaction of huge amount of money and don't think it can only be concluded through email and telephone conversation. You can also send an empty account details without any money in it provided that the account can receive funds is very good and ok. We will forward application for the release of the funds on your behalf to the security company in custody of the fund.We will also proceed all the vital and legal documents in your name to prove you as the rightful and legal beneficiary to the deceased. You should send the requested details and telephone number to reach you on phone so we can have a word conversation together.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the need for my presence in this matter. However, I would like to understand more about the details before proceeding further.

Could you please provide me with some additional information about the source of these funds and the security company involved? It would be helpful to know more about the legal documents that will be processed in my name as well.

Also, I prefer not to share my account details at this stage. Is there any other way we can proceed with this transaction?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

Thank you for your mail. I detailed every procedures concerning this transaction in my first mail to you.I also made it clear to you that trust should be our watch word. This transaction is about transfer of fund and account details must be required.If i should trust you with funds tuned to millions of dollars,why are you skeptical over sending digital numbers of an account? besides, you were requested to provide your full name,address and occupation together with a telephone number to reach you on phone. I will be briefing you on every stages and once application for payment is sent on your behalf,i will also send a copy as well to you too and together is applicable to all other documents secured on your behalf.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate you providing more information about the transfer of funds. I understand that trust is important in this process.

I apologize if I seemed skeptical earlier. It's just that I've never been involved in a digital transfer of such a large amount before, so I want to make sure everything is done correctly and securely.

Could you please explain to me how the funds will be transferred? Are there any fees or charges associated with the transfer? And what kind of documents do I need to provide?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

Thank you for your mail. The fund will be telegraphically wired to your designated account information even right in your presence. We will cater for the expenses and also secure all the vital together with the legal documents to prove you as the rightful beneficiary.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to cater for the expenses and secure the necessary documents. Can you please provide me with more details about the fund? How much money are we talking about here?

Also, could you clarify what exactly I need to do in order to receive the funds? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

Thank you so much for your mail. The total amount is 3,759,000.00 GPB. You are only required to provide the requested details and when all the procedures are set to transfer the funds, your presence might be required because everything would be done right in your presence and also for you to be very sure about the transaction we are doing too. I am not the only one involved in this transaction with you.I have an insider in the security company and he is the main key to the success of this transaction. His friend( a top government official) is also involved and it is through his contacts that we intend to secure all the vital and legal documents in your name to prove you as the rightful beneficiary to the funds.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the process and the involvement of your insider in the security company. It's good to know that there are measures in place to ensure the success of this transaction.

Could you please provide more details about the legal documents that will be secured in my name? I want to make sure everything is done properly and legally.

Also, could you clarify what you meant by "the total amount is GPB"? Is that a currency abbreviation or a typo?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

it is the security company that would demand documents like clearances from the ministries and probate registry. This is a gradually process and any documents gotten on your behalf. Copies of every documents will also be sent to you. The  abbreviation GBP is meant to stand for Great British Pound. Please send the requested details and telephone number to reach you on phone so we can start the process immediately.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the security company and the process involved in obtaining clearances from the ministries and probate registry. It's good to know that copies of the documents will also be sent to me.

Regarding the GBP, I understand now that it stands for Great British Pound. That makes sense.

Before I proceed with sending any details, could you please provide me with more information about why these clearances are necessary? What purpose do they serve in this process?

Also, I would like to know how long this whole process usually takes. Is there a specific timeline that I should be aware of?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

Everything has to be done accordingly to the law that you are the rightful and legal beneficiary to the fund.Once the transfer is done,your government/bank will also demand documents to show the funds deposited in your account is from a genuine source and not funds for terrorist attacks,drugs or money laundering. This whole process will not exceed more than 14 banking days.
Regards,

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about following the law and ensuring that the transfer is done properly. Can you please provide more information about the documents that the government bank will require? I want to make sure that everything is in order and there are no issues with the funds.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about following the law and ensuring that the transfer is done properly. Can you please provide more information about the specific documents that the government bank will require? I want to make sure that everything is in order and there are no issues with the funds.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "banking days"? Is that different from regular business days? I just want to have a clear understanding of the timeline for this process.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

i don't seems to understand you any more.If you are serious with me,send the requested information so i can proceed. I am tired of this your questions on everything.You are becoming like a merely joker.

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Hi John,

I apologize if my questions have been confusing or seem like a joke. I assure you that I am serious about understanding what you are requesting. Could you please clarify what information you would like to share? I'm here to listen and learn.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:
Charles,

You don't have to act like a nonentity.i demanded your details and occupation but no information was given by you. After every explanations to you,all you will do is to ask questions as if i am the security company myself.i told you that this is a gradually process and you will be notified in every stages. Why all this irrelevant questions?

John.

subject: Re: Hello Charles.
body:

I apologize if my questions seemed irrelevant to you. I just wanted to make sure I understand the process correctly. Can you please explain to me again how this security company works and what stages I will be notified about? I want to make sure I have all the information before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Charles

If you can't send the requested information, no need to continue with this discussion.

John.
